description: Fragrant minced pork and crisp green beans make for a different take on a quick midweek stir fry.
name: Pork, Noodle & Green Bean Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g green beans, trimmed and cut in half
1 tbs rice wine vinegar, peeled and minced

recipeInstructions.text: In a large wok over a medium high heat, heat half the oil and cook the pork mince for 3-4 minutes, breaking up with a spoon. Pour over half the soy sauce, rice wine vinegar and honey and cook for 30 seconds, remove from the wok and set aside on a plate.
Add the remaining oil to the pan and cook half the spring onions, garlic, ginger and red chilli for 2 minutes then add the chopped green beans and cook for 2 more minutes.
Return the pork mince to the pan and add the noodles and remaining soy sauce and cook for 2 minutes to heat through.
Stir in the toasted sesame oil just before serving and top with the rest of the spring onion.
